analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca apacaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
